name: project-cost-quality-management
description: Project Cost & Quality Management System - Monorepo

scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend:dev" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
